Detailed Description

This header defines the GTI APIs for accessing registers of the target device.

Copyright (c) 1998-2017, Texas Instruments Inc., All rights reserved.

Typedef Documentation

typedef GTI_RETURN_TYPE( GTI_FN_REG)(GTI_HANDLE_TYPE, GTI_REGID_TYPE, GTI_REGISTER_TYPE *)

Function type for GTI_READREG() and GTI_WRITEREG().

Examples:
CortexA8_Linux_Example.cpp, CortexA8_PRSC_Example.cpp, GTI_API_Example.cpp, and TargetAdapter_Example.cpp.

Function Documentation

GTI_EXPORT GTI_RETURN_TYPE GTI_READREG ( GTI_HANDLE_TYPE  hpid,
GTI_REGID_TYPE  regNo,
GTI_REGISTER_TYPE *  regValue 
)

GTI_READREG() - Read target register.

This function reads a single register from target core. regNo is an index to select which register to read. Register indices supported by the core are found in the XML files located in:
"CCS installation"/ccs_base/common/targetdb/drivers/TI_reg_ids.
The register XML file name that maps to a core can be found in the "regids_mapping.xml" file located in the same "TI_reg_ids" folder above.

Returns:
0 on success, -1 on error.
Parameters:
[in]hpidGTI API instance handle.
[in]regNoIndex of register to read.
[out]regValuePointer to return value read.
Examples:
CortexA8_Linux_Example.cpp, CortexA8_PRSC_Example.cpp, and GTI_API_Example.cpp.
GTI_EXPORT GTI_RETURN_TYPE GTI_WRITEREG ( GTI_HANDLE_TYPE  hpid,
GTI_REGID_TYPE  regNo,
GTI_REGISTER_TYPE *  regValue 
)

GTI_WRITEREG() - Write to target register.

This function writes to a single register on the target core. regNo is an index to select which register to write. Register indices supported by the core are found in the XML files located in:
"CCS installation"/ccs_base/common/targetdb/drivers/TI_reg_ids.
The register XML file name that maps to a core can be found in the "regids_mapping.xml" file located in the same "TI_reg_ids" folder above.

Returns:
0 on success, -1 on error.
Parameters:
[in]hpidGTI API instance handle.
[in]regNoIndex of register to write.
[out]regValuePointer to value to write.
Examples:
CortexA8_Linux_Example.cpp, CortexA8_PRSC_Example.cpp, and GTI_API_Example.cpp.
